typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		rank as string,
		movie_title as string,
		year as string,
		rating as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(decade = floor((toInteger(year)/10))*10) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(decade),
	movie_title = count(movie_title),
		rating = mean(toFloat(rating))) ~> Aggregate1
